activities: We collect and process personal and business information provided to us by our clients or on behalf of our clients. The collections are done through instructions given by our clients or court order. Franklin Data's possession and use of personal information is largely incidental to our primary task of providing electronic discovery services to our clients.
personaldata: The data we receive (electronically and manually processed)  will relate to our clients and their business activities and may include personal information about our clients’ employees, business contacts, customer, and any other individuals with whom our clients have dealings.
recoursemech: Franklin Data will investigate and attempt to resolve complaints and disputes. For complaints that cannot be resolved between Franklin Data and the complainant, Franklin Data agrees to cooperate with data protection authorities (EU DPAs) located in the EU (or their authorized representatives) and participate in any dispute resolution procedures established by such authorities pursuant to the Safe Harbor Principles.
